4218: Software Testing
3203: Software Project
Thìš mödülè cövèrs thè concepts and prãctīće of software testing including unït testing, integration testing,
änd regression testing. Various testing coverage criteria will be discussed. Debugging methods for finding the
-root-cause of errors in failing test cases will also be investigated. The use öf testing and analysis for
performance prediction, performance clustering and performance debugging will be studied. Students will acquire
crucial skills on testing and debugging through hands-on assignments.
